original_text: So Moses went back and summoned the elders of the people and set before them all the words the Lord had commanded him to speak.
korean_text: 모세가 내려와서 백성의 장로들을 불러 여호와께서 자기에게 명령하신 그 모든 말씀을 그들 앞에 진술하니

sentences.original_text: and summoned the elders of the people
and set before them all the words
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들 앞에 모든 말씀을 두었습니다

sentences.original_text: the Lord had commanded him to speak
